channel.title: CVE Feed for s::can -- moni:tools
channel.description: The latest CVEs for s::can -- moni:tools

item.title: CVE-2020-12507|2024-08-04T11:56:52.087Z -- s%3A%3Acan -- moni%3Atools
item.description: In s::can moni::tools before version 4.2 an authenticated attacker could get full access to the database through SQL injection. This may result in loss of confidentiality, loss of integrity and DoS.
